languages.text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer performs a melee attack after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a Toughness test with a -15 penalty or become prone.

Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} after a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a -15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击之后进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，近战攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，此次检定会受到−15{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。如果目标未能通过检定，会立刻陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者在{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击之后进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}时，近战攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，此次检定会受到-15{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。如果目标未能通过检定，会立刻陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态。

languages.text: Когда персонаж следом за дистанционной атакой совершает атаку в ближнем бою, цель {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атаки вблизи{/g} выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −15 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж следом за {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционной{/g} атакой совершает {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}, цель атаки вблизи выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −15 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g}.

Когда персонаж следом за {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционной{/g} атакой совершает {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаку в ближнем бою{/g}, цель атаки вблизи выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −15 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинута{/g}.

languages.text: 自身が{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃の後に{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}をする度、近接攻撃のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−15で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しないと{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 自身が{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃の後に{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}をする度、近接攻撃のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}-15で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しないと{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} después de un ataque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}, el objetivo del ataque cuerpo a cuerpo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −15 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} después de un ataque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}, el objetivo del ataque cuerpo a cuerpo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -15 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} nach einem {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriff{/g} ausführt, sollte das Ziel des Nahkampfangriffs eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-Widerstands{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −15 bestehen oder {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} werden.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} nach einem {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriff{/g} ausführt, sollte das Ziel des Nahkampfangriffs eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeits{/g}-Widerstands{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -15 bestehen oder {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} werden.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} après une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}, la cible de l'attaque de mêlée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −15, faute de quoi il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, the target of the melee attack should pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or get knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g} après une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}, la cible de l'attaque de mêlée doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -15, faute de quoi il subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.
